message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fair starting point, considering your money will depreciate faster than mine.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair split considering the depreciation rates. Your 30% is still a generous offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need at least 4500 to make this worthwhile. We both need to be reasonable with the depreciation.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think you're still getting a better deal than me with the depreciation. Let's try to find a more balanced split.
